import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton'; function Product() { const { id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const getProduct = async () => { setLoading(true); const response = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${id}`); const data = await response.json(); setProduct(data); setLoading(false); } }, [id]); const Loading = () => { return ( <>
) } const ShowDetails = () => { return ( <>
